body.name: Microfiber Flat Mop for Floor Cleaning, Floor Dust Mop with 2 Reusable Washable Mop Pads - VOUBIEN Wet Dry Mop Household Cleaning Tools for Hardwood, Vinyl, Laminate, Tile Cleaning

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 45 mins
features: 【Microfiber Floor Mops for Home Cleaning】Flat mop made of premium quality microfiber material , Which not only can quickly absorb the water stains on the floor surface, easily take away the dirt on the floor, without leaving streaks or scratches on the floor. Lightweight design makes mopping a breeze! Can use as wet and dry mop.

【360°Rotating Flexible Mop Head】Microfiber mop for floor cleaning features a ultra-slim flat mop head, and that can be flexible rotated 360 degrees, which allows you to effortlessly wipe up all hard to reach areas in the house, such as deep corners in the kitchen bathroom or under the sofa so on. The trapezoidal design makes the floor mop head easier to clean the edges and corners.

【Premium Mop Handle 】Compared to other reusable mops, Our microfiber cleaning mop handle is made of thick stainless steel, which is more stable. Don't worry about the handle being bent or broken due to pressure during use. 51.2 inch extended handle design, Without bending over, reducing the strain on your waist.

【Reusable Replacement Mop Pads】Flat mop come with 2 mop pads , Which are machine washable and reusable, Which is economical and environmentally friendly compared with disposable replacement pads. There are hooks on the mop pads for easy drying .

【Fit for Multiple Types of Floors 】Dust mop for hardwood floor cleaning can easily and safely handle all stubborn stains on most flat hard-surface floors and walls, such as hardwood, laminate, tile, wood, marble, glass etc. We offer 365-day worry-free warranty, if you have any problem for our floor mop with washable pads in use, contact us .

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dry and Wet Use Microfiber mop pads, which has super dust removal and water absorption.When using it, you can use it either as a dry mop or as a wet mop. 360° Rotation Mops Head Flexible floor mop head allows to reach any crevices and deep corner with ease such as under the sofa, bed ect. Make your cleaning easier. Easy to Store You could hang the mop on the wall when you not using it. Do not need to make more room for the flat mop.

Convenient Velcro Design Convenient Velcro design makes attaching or removing the mop pads a breeze. Easy to clean. you only need to remove the mop pad to rinse or washing machine. Reusable Mop Pads Our high quality microfiber cloths can be washed by hand or machine up to 500 times .Repeated washing will not weaken cleaning ability or water absorption capacity.1pcs Microfiber pad is equivalent to more than 200 disposable mop pads. they are the perfect replacement for money-wasting and resource-wasting disposable cloths. Cleaning Scraper A cleaning helper, You can use it to clean the hair on the mop pads, remove excess water, and clean up stubborn stains on the ground.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s not heavy which makes it easy to move around
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my wood floors and initially I tried it dried which picked up pet hairs that I didn’t even notice I had. Then I decided to try it wet and it worked well It’s comes with two Mop heads so I was able to try it on glass. The apt has lots of glass three rooms with one wall entirely made of glass which I was happy to be able to clean with this mop. As for the Mopping it is not heavy which is great cause when cleaning the glass wall it doesn’t make my arms hurt from doing the physical work. I must say I purchased this for the floor but I will be using it for the glass walls and doors. It does a great job on glass and made my job easier. Another thing I like is that there’s no waste the mop heads Can be cleaned and washed. I use to buy the ones that I had to buy packages of sheets to put in the mop and it was so much waste and I spent much more money. Overall I really like this and I recommend getting this instead of the ones that you need to purchase refills for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed something small and quick just for my room and this helps clean and sweep with it so pushes the dirt together and get the dust pan and good to go . The little scraper works good removing my dog hair .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite mop ever. It’s easy to use. You can use it wet or dry and because of the shape of the pads you can get edges and corners easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: This mop was a lot cheaper in price than similar ones. Well quality is also cheaper the handle broke as I was trying to put it together. So I should have just sent the few extra dollars and probably would have got a better one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cleans above expectation
reviews.reviewText: This product exceeded my expectations. It is an excellent tool for cleaning floors. Its soft and absorbent microfibre material easily captures dirt, dust, and debris, leaving floors sparkling clean. Unlike traditional mop heads, the microfibre mop doesn't require harsh chemicals, making it an eco-friendly option. It's also versatile and it works well on various types of floors, including hardwood, tile, and laminate. The mop head is removable and machine washable, making it easy to maintain. Overall, this microfibre floor mop is a great investment for anyone looking for a quick and efficient way to keep their floors clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and flexible
reviews.reviewText: This mop is very easy to set and use. The handle is too long so you don't need to bend while mopping. The fiber cloth is very easy to clean with the attached brush. It is flexible in any direction which makes it easy to clean even the edge/corners of the rooms..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: I have given this another star. I used it tonight to dry mop my floor and it did a good job of sweeping cat hair. I also used my stand up dustpan with it. That went really well as the dust and hair went right into it. I found out it is easy to clean by running hot water over it. The reasons I won't give it 5 stars are because, as I said before, there are no instructions, the buttons are extremely hard to push in to take it apart and it is hard to get it to stand up by itself. Unless you sit it away from a surface, the handle falls to one side or the other.It took me over an hr. to get the extending poles on correctly. The picture, on the box, shows a grey whatchamathingy on it. It presents to be on the second pole. After spending a humongous amount of time, readjusting to, what I thought, was the correct setting, it turned out I had it right the first time.I didn't realize the whatchamathingy comes off. I call it that because I see no purpose for it. It's grey with poky looking nubs on it. I cannot, for the life of me, figure out what it's for.The buttons, once entered into the pole, are almost impossible to push in to retract one. So once you get it in, be sure you have it right because you don't want to end up trying numerous items to get it undone again.If you have arthritis or any other debilitating hand issues, I do NOT recommend buying this. It is very difficult to put together and take apart.I used the dry mop feature and was, relatively, happy with the results. On the other hand, it kept trying to unscrew making it difficult to get between items. I used it in my kitchen.I made the mistake of trying to mop with the pad I'd dusted my floor with. The results were disastrous. My whole floor looks like it has a white powder on it. You receive two pads. My suggestion is to use one for dry and one for wet.This is where the positive comes in. I was impressed with how easy it is to apply the pads. There is a Velcro effect when you press the pad on the plate. The pads do not come off, on their own, whether wet or dry. It is a clever design.My experience was not favorable, but I do like the fact it is light, the pads do a good job of dry mopping. It was my error to use the same pad for dry and wet. Once I use the clean one to mop my floor, I will update my results and, possibly, upgrade the star rating.
